Two trophies in two seasons? Spurs brush Doncaster Rovers aside in EFL Cup
arts.sum: Thomas Frank's Tottenham Hotspur brush aside League One Doncaster Rovers 3-0 in their EFL Cup third round clash at the Tottenham Hotspur Stadium on Wednesday.
